es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.attt

Class AdvancedTTTMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.model.GameMove
      • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.connectN.ConnectNMove
        • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.attt.AdvancedTTTMove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AdvancedTTTMove
extends ConnectNMove
    A class representing a move for Advance Tic-Tac-Toe. It is similar to ConnectNMove, but it takes the piece-count into account. Note that it inherits the fromString capabilities from ConnectNMove.

    Clase que representa un movimiento de Tic-Tac-Toe avanzado. Es similar a ConnectNMove, pero tiene en cuenta el contador de fichas. Observa que hereda de ConnectNMove el metodo formString.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
